author: Ryan Heath
title: Spain pushes coordinated global strategy to fight coronavirus pandemic
description: Pedro Sánchez, the country’s prime minister, is calling for “seamless solidarity” to beat the virus.
content:
Cabanas urged American action to support a global response because of a great risk the authoritarian governments will be perceived as handling the pandemic better than democracies.
